metadata.name: Lovers under the Moon
metadata.description: In a virtual space-blockchain, you can find your own unique colored traditional Korean costumes, patterns and calligraphy signature in the famous 18th century genre painting ‘Lovers under the moon.’ In addition, by using the various scenes from the Album of Genre Paintings by Sin Yun-bok, a secret and sweet dating scene of Jeongin(Lovers) in the 18th century Seoul was newly incarnated. You can become the main character of the 'Jeongin(Lovers)' of the 18th century presented by Album of Genre Paintings by Sin Yun-bok.
